ProductInfo.Features:
Brand New Sony Bloggie Live MHS-TS55 Complete with Accessories
8GB, Full HD 1080p video, 12.8-megapixel stills, 3.0" (diag.) touch screen, MP4 video format, Wi-Fi® enabled for easy uploads, live streaming capabilities, flip-out USB arm for uploading/charging
Wi-Fi® enabled video and still image camera + Wi-Fi® Live Streaming + Wi-Fi® direct uploading + Share Function + Share via Connected Phone/Tablet
SteadyShot® image stabilization +  12.8MP still images + Face Detection technology + Sony® ExmorTM CMOS sensor + LED light for low-light shooting situations + 4x Digital Zoom & Auto Macro
Slim design with easy operation + HDMI output + Flip-out USB arm for upload/charge + Built-in rechargeable battery
ProductInfo.Name: MHS-TS55 Sony Digital Camera HD 1080p Video Touch Screen Bloggie Live Handheld Portable with Wireless Wifi for Internet and Apps (Silver)
